long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Side Tab Manager  - Side Panel🚀

Powerful side panel tab manager that helps you stay organized and boost your productivity!

Key Features
Smart Tab Organization 🎯

Drag & Drop tab reordering
Group tabs by domain automatically
Pin important tabs
Favorite your most-used tabs
Mute/Unmute tabs instantly

Universal Search 🔍

Search across all open tabs
Search through browser history
Real-time results
Quick tab switching
Instant history access

Automatic Tab Management ⚡

Auto-close inactive tabs
Customizable inactivity timer
Exclude pinned tabs
Exclude favorite tabs
Notification before closing
Quick restore closed tabs

Advanced Statistics 📊

Total tabs counter
Domain analysis
Most visited sites
Category breakdown
Usage patterns
Activity tracking

Smart Features 💡

Side panel interface
Dark/Light mode support
Multiple language support
Quick keyboard shortcuts
Browser memory optimization
Tab cleanup automation

How to Use
Basic Navigation

Click the extension icon to open the side panel
View all your tabs in an organized list
Use the top buttons to switch between views:

All Tabs
Favorites
History
Groups

Tab Management

🖱️ Drag and drop tabs to reorder
📌 Pin important tabs with one click
🔇 Mute noisy tabs instantly
⭐ Save favorites for quick access
❌ Close tabs with a single click

Auto-Close Feature

Click "Auto Close" in the footer
Select inactivity timeout:

30 minutes
1 hour
2 hours
6 hours
12 hours
24 hours

Choose exclusion rules:

Exclude pinned tabs
Exclude favorite tabs

Get notifications before tabs are closed

Search Function

Type in the search bar to find:

Open tabs
Recent history
Closed tabs

Click results to:

Switch to open tabs
Open history items
Restore closed tabs

Statistics Dashboard

View detailed insights about:

Total tab count
Domain distribution
Usage patterns
Visit frequencies
Category breakdown
Active domains

Perfect For
👩‍💼 Professionals managing multiple tasks
🎓 Students doing research
💻 Power users with many tabs
🌐 Heavy browser users
📱 Multi-taskers
🔍 Information gatherers
Benefits
✨ Better tab organization
⚡ Improved productivity
💾 Reduced memory usage
🎯 Enhanced focus
⏰ Time-saving features
🔄 Seamless workflow
System Requirements

Chrome 88 or later
All operating systems supported
Minimal memory footprint
Fast and responsive

Try Side Tab Manager today and take control of your tabs! 🚀
